publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1088 Andrew Wilson: School Closures in Cumbernauld-That the Parliament notes that the documentary evidence placed before North Lanarkshire Council concerning Cumbernauld schools' closures contained inaccuracies; further notes with concern that once these inaccuracies were identified, no attempt was made to advise the Council of them; believes, on the basis of these inaccuracies, that the schools' closures process is flawed, and calls upon North Lanarkshire Council to suspend all further school closures until a thorough investigation has taken place.
